    public class Pipeline.Options
extends OptionList

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Option<java.lang.Float> bufferSize
      size of all inter-component buffers (in seconds).
      Option<java.lang.Integer> countdown
      duration of pipeline start-up phase.
      Option<java.lang.Boolean> log
      write system log to file.
      Option<Log.Level> loglevel
      show all logs greater or equal than level.
      Option<java.lang.String> logpath
      location of log file.
      Option<java.lang.Double> logtimeout
      repeated log entries with a duration delta smaller than the timeout value are ignored.
      Option<Pipeline.SyncType> sync
      Cross-device synchronization (requires network).
      Option<java.lang.String> syncHost
      enter IP address of host pipeline for synchronization (leave empty if this is the host).
      Option<java.lang.Float> syncInterval
      define time between clock sync attempts (requires CONTINUOUS sync).
      Option<java.lang.Integer> syncPort
      set port for synchronizing pipeline over network.
      Option<java.lang.Boolean> terminateOnError
      Shut down pipeline if runtime error is encountered
      Option<java.lang.Float> waitSensorConnect
      How long to wait for a sensor to connect.
      Option<java.lang.Float> waitThreadKill
      How long to wait for threads to finish on pipeline shutdown.

    • Field Detail

      • countdown

        public final Option<java.lang.Integer> countdown
        duration of pipeline start-up phase. Default: 3

      • bufferSize

        public final Option<java.lang.Float> bufferSize
        size of all inter-component buffers (in seconds). Default: 2.0

      • waitThreadKill

        public final Option<java.lang.Float> waitThreadKill
        How long to wait for threads to finish on pipeline shutdown. Default: 30.0

      • waitSensorConnect

        public final Option<java.lang.Float> waitSensorConnect
        How long to wait for a sensor to connect. Default: 30.0

      • sync

        public final Option<Pipeline.SyncType> sync
        Cross-device synchronization (requires network). Default: NONE

      • syncHost

        public final Option<java.lang.String> syncHost
        enter IP address of host pipeline for synchronization (leave empty if this is the host). Default: null

      • syncPort

        public final Option<java.lang.Integer> syncPort
        set port for synchronizing pipeline over network. Default: 55100

      • syncInterval

        public final Option<java.lang.Float> syncInterval
        define time between clock sync attempts (requires CONTINUOUS sync). Default: 1.0

      • log

        public final Option<java.lang.Boolean> log
        write system log to file. Default: false

      • logpath

        public final Option<java.lang.String> logpath
        location of log file. Default: /sdcard/SSJ/[time]

      • loglevel

        public final Option<Log.Level> loglevel
        show all logs greater or equal than level. Default: VERBOSE

      • logtimeout

        public final Option<java.lang.Double> logtimeout
        repeated log entries with a duration delta smaller than the timeout value are ignored. Default: 1.0

      • terminateOnError

        public final Option<java.lang.Boolean> terminateOnError
        Shut down pipeline if runtime error is encountered
